purpose: Facilitate AI-driven automation and interaction with macOS applications for enhanced accessibility and control.
principle: Leverages macOS accessibility APIs to automate and control native applications, allowing AI agents to perform tasks traditionally done by users.
reusability: Can be integrated into AI systems requiring macOS application automation, with potential for customization based on specific app interactions.
limitations: Limited to macOS applications and may require specific accessibility permissions; not all applications may be fully supported.
name: macOS-use
description: Make Mac apps accessible for AI agents
highlight: Enables AI agents to interact with native macOS applications through accessibility features.
